definition[0]: if an animal grazes, or if you graze it, it eats grass that is growing
example[0]: fields where they used to graze their sheep
example[1]: Groups of cattle were grazing on the rich grass.
definition[1]: to accidentally break the surface of your skin by rubbing it against something
example[2]: I fell on the gravel, severely grazing my knee.
definition[2]: to touch something lightly while passing it, sometimes damaging it
definition[3]: to eat small amounts of food all through the day instead of having regular meals
definition[4]: a wound caused by rubbing that slightly breaks the surface of your skin
example[4]: Adam walked away from the crash with just a graze on his left shoulder.
